Datasets

  • A geospatial list of Mexican Ports
  • Vessel Tracking Data from Mexico’s Vessel Monitoring System (2007 - present)
  • Vessel registry of Mexican small- and large-scale vessels
  • Historical landings by economic unit for Mexico (2000-present)

Software

  • EventHorizon: An R Package to build panels for event-study models based on a user-specified time horizon for repeated interventions
  • EVR628tools: An R Package with datasets, palettes, and functions to help in the instruction of EVR 528 / 628 Introduction to Data Management and Visualization for Environmental Scientists.
